title: The six new fragrances that are secretly created by 'master perfumers'
text:
If I told you I was shopping for a new couture gown you’d probably stop reading this immediately. After all, it’s unlikely you would ever spend tens of thousands of pounds on a garment that’s been handcrafted by master couturiers.

You could however, afford a fragrance that’s been whisked up by a ‘Master Perfumer’ a title given to the most experienced and talented perfumers - of which there are only a handful of in the world. You wouldn’t know it, because the perfumer isn’t named on the bottle, but a number well-known designer fragrances have a master behind them - and they’re available at a counter near you.

I divulge this merely for it relates to a new season scent that has taken my fancy: ...
description: If I told you I was shopping for a new couture gown you’d probably stop reading this immediately.
